reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of GEOG 102, GEOB 102, GEOG 200, GEOB 200, GEOG 204, GEOB 204, ATSC 201, EOSC 112. (3rd year standing.)
This is a wait list for GEOG 312, section 201, Term 2. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: Climates over the geological, historical and instrument periods. Theories of climatic change. Monitoring and modelling the climate system. Impacts of change on environmental and socio-economic systems.
